m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Price Target Raised at Morgan Stanley - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Price Target Raised at Morgan Stanley By Rachel Graf | 08/17/15 - 09:24 AM EDT NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors' ( TSLA - Get Report )  price target was hiked to $465 from $280 at Morgan Stanley on Monday morning. The firm said that the future of electric vehicles is shifting toward an autonomous, shared mobility model in which smart technology propels shared transportation, and Morgan Stanley would be "surprised" if Tesla didn't announce formal business plans on shared mobility within 12 to 18 months.
